description: React component for handling OAuth callback redirects within a Next.js application. It processes URL search parameters to redirect users to provider-specific pages or a default connection page, ensuring smooth OAuth flow management.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouter
methods.description: Main exported React component that wraps callback handling with a Suspense boundary.

methods.name: OAuthCallbackRouterInner
methods.description: Inner component that reads URL params and redirects according to provider and status.
